edu.biu.protocols.yao.primitives

Class CommunicationConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.protocols.yao.primitives.CommunicationConfig

  • public class CommunicationConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class sets the communication between the parties participate in the protocol.

    The type of communication used is native, since it provides better performance than the java implementation.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Asaf Cohen)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommunicationConfig(java.lang.String configFilename)
      A constructor that gets the name of the communication configuration file and use it to initialize the internal class members.

      Returns the information about the malicious OT server.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommunicationConfig

        public CommunicationConfig(java.lang.String configFilename)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        A constructor that gets the name of the communication configuration file and use it to initialize the internal class members.
        Parameters:
        configFilename - The name of the file that contains the communication configuration.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case there is a problem to find the malicious OT server.
